title: Vincent Price Collection Preview [CSA]
description:
Welcome to the Vincent Price Collection Preview. Sit back and relax as you enjoy a sample video called "Vincent". Also included are cover images of additional titles available in the 400 gigabyte mega-torrent "ChristianStuff". 

Our digital library offers hundreds of files in three categories: Christian, Health and Fiction.

The speed at which files can be retrieved depends on patrons making returns to the library by sharing the files they receive. In other words, the success of this archive depends on you!

To access the library you'll need to get the torrent file from TorCache or you can use the magnet link (THE LINKS ARE IN THE README).
_____________________________________________________________________________________

MORE INFO:

Our extensive 80 gigabyte collection of Vincent Price includes more than 150 animations, movies, television show appearances and commercials, spanning over 50 years of Mr. Price's works.

For those of you who may be unfamiliar with him, please allow me to introduce you to Mr. Vincent Leonard Price, Jr., born on May 27, 1911 in St. Louis, Missouri. 

Mr. Price was an American actor known for his distinctive voice and performances in horror films. His career spanned other genres, including film noir, drama, mystery, thriller, and comedy. He appeared on stage, television, radio, and in over one hundred films. He earned two stars on the Hollywood Walk of Fame: one for motion pictures, and one for television.

He was also an art collector and consultant, with a degree in art history. He founded the Vincent Price Art Museum in California, lectured and wrote books on the subject.

He also enjoyed exotic cuisine and was considered to be a noted gourmet cook.

During his life, he was married three times and had two children. He passed away in Los Angeles, California on October 25, 1993, at the age of 82.
_____________________________________________________________________________________

*** MORE ***
_____________________________________________________________________________________

You may be wondering why a Christian would have anything to do with an icon of horror and the kingdom of darkness? 

EXCELLENT QUESTION !!! Why do we do what we do ???

For all of my brothers and sisters in Christ:
My prayer is that next Halloween you might think twice!

We are to fear the Lord and depart from evil,
But that's not what's practiced amongst God's people!

Once a year we desire to quiver in fright,
As we celebrate Satan with ghoulish delight.

Haunted houses with ghosts, goblins and demons,
Horror fills the night with terror and scream'n!

"But it's just for fun" you might say,
Of that most unholy pagan holiday.

Please take a long look in the mirror tonight:
Do you see any resemblance to the late Vincent Price?
_____________________________________________________________________________________

For we wrestle not against flesh and blood, 
but against principalities, against powers, 
against the rulers of the darkness of this world, 
against spiritual wickedness in high places. 
Ephesians 6:10-18

ChristianStuff: Health mind, body and soul!
